bio:
Self-taught, passionate since childhood about technology and the web particularly, I undertook a career change for web development in 2018. I have since been hired as a fullstack developer in mid-2019.

Today, I'd like to find a company that matches my values and to offer my knowledge and experience in the service of a product that feels truly useful.

experiences.title: Fullstack Developer
achievements: Bootstrapping and development, with the team, of a new project around planning and billing work shifts, currently in production, with Phoenix (Elixir), GraphQL and React.
Bug fixes and feature development on a legacy project for managing deliveries with Rails, Grape (REST API), Ember and Vue.
Take over and maintenance of an existing mobile application for delivery men (and women) with React Native.
Rspec-Rails test suite optimisation to speed up continuous integration pipelines: 40min ⇒ 5min.
Complete makeover of a product for editing complex delivery pricing grids with Vue.
Designing, modelling, and writing technical specs, in collaboration with Product Managers, for the evolution of a large legacy project.

skills.details: Excellent level in JavaScript/Node, solid base in TypeScript. Good knowledge of Elixir and Ruby. Knowledge of Go, Scala, Python. Notions of PHP.
Mastery of REST APIs and GraphQL, MVC frameworks like Rails and Phoenix, and lightweight Node.js frameworks like Koa and Express.
Mastery of HTML5, CSS3, as well as the React & Vue frameworks and their ecosystems (Redux, Saga, Vuex, Apollo).
Good knowledge of SQL and PostgreSQL. Explorations with MongoDB.
Knowledge of Docker, Kubernetes, Nginx. Able to automate application deployments with CI-CD tools.
Mastery of Photoshop. At ease with XD/Sketch/Figma. Basic Illustrator/InDesign.
Knowledge of SEO basics. Google Digital Garage Certificate.
